content: Is it possible to rename a group conversation to, for instance, "Patient Innovator Judges"? (Can't imagine WHERE I got that example)
You can rename private streams but you cannot name or rename private chats among groups of individuals. (Sorry the nomenclature is confusing here...)
That is odd. I didn't know there are private streams but that may be a wise option.
@Dave deBronkart if you would like to do this for the upcoming session, please let @David Johnson know and he can assist you at setting this up if you need help.
